name: CP-6
description: Guide the user through establishing an alternate storage site for system backup, ensuring necessary agreements and equivalent controls are in place.

agreements_status.description: The status of agreements needed for the storage and retrieval of backup information at the alternate site.

primary_site_controls.description: The controls currently in place at the primary storage site.

alternate_site_location.description: The location of the alternate storage site where system backup information will be stored.

equivalent_controls_check.description: Whether the controls at the alternate site have been checked and verified to be equivalent to the primary site.
